_header: Saint Aethelwold the bishop in England was I-bore
Subjects: Aethelwold, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Aethelwold in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Aþelwold Bisschop was and in Engelonde iboreIn childhode
                    wel ȝong he gon forsake sunne and hore…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now swete lord Ihesu crist kyng of alle kyngeffor þe
                    loue of seint Aþelwold to þe Ioye of heuene vs bringe.
                    Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint aþelwold þe byschop in englond was yboreIn childhod
                    to clannesse he drow euer þe lenge þe more…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Now oure swete lord ihesu crist king of alle kingefor þe
                    loue of seint Aþelwold to þe Ioie of heuene ous bringe

BLAdd10626.First Lines:
Seint Adelwolde þe bischepe in englond was y boreIn chylhode
                    wel ȝong he gan to for sake synne & hore…
BLAdd10626.Last Lines:
…Now our lorde Ihesu Crist kyng of alle þyngeFor love of
                    Seint Adelwolde to þe Ioye of hevene vs brynge. Amen.

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Athelwolde þe bisshop was in Englond y boreIn childhode
                    ȝonge he began to forsake synne & hore…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Now swete lord Ihesu Crist of alle kynges kyngffor þe
                    love of saynt Athelwolde to þe ioye of heuen vs bringe Amen
Lam223.Note:
At the end of the first line ‘hore’ is glossed: ‘.i.
                    filþe’.
